name: user-routine
description: User-Routine is a JavaScript library to automate user routines on web pages. You can easily test features or create tutorials with actions such as click, await, and fill.

scripts.build: npm run build-lib && npm run build-blob && npm run build-template && npm run build-demo
scripts.build-demo: node utils/update-demo-pre.cjs && webpack --config webpack.config.demo.cjs && node utils/update-demo-post.cjs
scripts.build-local: npm run build-lib && npm run build-demo
scripts.build-v6: npm run build-v6-lib && npm run build-v6-demo
scripts.build-v6-demo: node utils/update-demo-pre.cjs && webpack --config webpack.config.v6.demo.cjs && node utils/update-demo-post.cjs

author: Cory Leigh Rahman
